::KitKat::

She looked at the new bot. "If you wish, you may help us get revenge 
against Megatron. he has proven that he is not worthy of being a 
leader.  He is also trying to eraticate all transformer life as we 
know it.  If he succeeds in his plans, we won't exist.  I hope you 
will join us.  We would be honored to have another fine warrior on 
our side."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "We're heading for the old cave whenever Kit Kat's ready" he stared 
off into
> the light morning sky again wondering if he'd ever get the chance 
to see it
> again, or a first time as the case was, is, will be, whatever. 
These time
> travel things confused him. "Kit Kat should be able to track 
Megatron from
> there." He placed a hand on his launcher, it wasn't much of a 
weapon but it
> had served him well in the past, future, whatever.
> 
> He turned to look Destructor in the eyes "So what's your stake in 
this war?
> What do you hope to achieve." he kept his eight eyes on Destructor 
awaiting
> his response. nobot in thier right mind would volentarily step into 
the
> middle of an ongoing war, help strangers, and assist in an attack 
without
> having higher stakes in mind.
>
